parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The content to purge. Exact match is supported.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

>  The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Valid values: 1 to 100000.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 20. Valid values: 1 to 50.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID. You can call the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The task status. Valid values:

*   **Complete**: The task is complete.
*   **Refreshing**: The task is in progress.
*   **Failed**: The task failed.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The task type. Valid values:

*   **file** (default): purges the cache by file.
*   **cachetag**: purges the cache by cache tag.
*   **directory**: purges the cache by directory.
*   **ignoreParams**: purges the cache by URL with specified parameters ignored.
*   **hostname**: purges the cache by hostname.
*   **purgeall**: purges all cache.
